recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: Classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook pasta according to package instructions
2. Fry pancetta until crispy
3. Mix eggs and cheese
4. Combine hot pasta with egg mixture and pancetta
5. Season with black pepper

recipes.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.description: Creamy Indian curry with tender chicken pieces in a spiced tomato sauce
recipes.instructions:
1. Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices
2. Grill chicken until charred
3. Simmer in tomato sauce with cream
4. Garnish with cilantro

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.description: Quick and healthy Asian-style stir-fried vegetables with tofu
recipes.instructions:
1. Cut vegetables into uniform pieces
2. Press and cube tofu
3. Stir-fry vegetables in batches
4. Add sauce and tofu
5. Serve over rice

recipes.name: Greek Salad
recipes.description: Fresh Mediterranean salad with feta cheese and olives
recipes.instructions:
1. Chop vegetables
2. Combine in bowl
3. Add feta and olives
4. Dress with olive oil and oregano

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
recipes.description: Mexican-style tacos with seasoned ground beef and fresh toppings
recipes.instructions:
1. Brown beef with taco seasoning
2. Warm tortillas
3. Assemble with toppings
4. Serve with lime wedges

recipes.name: Pad Thai
recipes.description: Classic Thai stir-fried rice noodles with peanuts and tamarind sauce
recipes.instructions:
1. Soak rice noodles
2. Stir-fry protein
3. Add noodles and sauce
4. Toss with peanuts and lime

recipes.name: Chicken Curry
recipes.description: Spicy Indian curry with tender chicken and aromatic spices
recipes.instructions:
1. Brown chicken
2. Sauté onions and spices
3. Simmer in tomato sauce
4. Finish with cream

recipes.name: Vegetable Soup
recipes.description: Hearty vegetable soup with seasonal vegetables
recipes.instructions:
1. Sauté vegetables
2. Add broth
3. Simmer until tender
4. Season to taste

recipes.name: Pasta Primavera
recipes.description: Light pasta dish with fresh spring vegetables
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook pasta
2. Sauté vegetables
3. Combine with pasta
4. Toss with olive oil and herbs

recipes.name: Chicken Stir Fry
recipes.description: Quick and healthy Asian-style chicken and vegetable stir fry
recipes.instructions:
1. Cut chicken and vegetables
2. Stir-fry chicken
3. Add vegetables
4. Toss with sauce
